ygData.subject: Re: Qeynos
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone know the stats of the bear hide armor? Chris aka Thunderheart lvl 11 Druid ... From: Elminstr95@aol.com [mailto:Elminstr95@aol.com] Sent: Monday, April
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone know the stats of the bear hide armor?

Chris aka Thunderheart lvl 11 Druid



-----Original Message-----
From: Elminstr95@... [mailto:Elminstr95@...]
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 3:29 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Qeynos


From: Elminstr95@...

There are several interesting quests in Qeynos, including the bear hide
armor
quests. Bear hide armor can be worn by all races and classes.
